full_threads.body:
This ticket has been open for over 5 days. If action is still required, please prioritize it. Otherwise, kindly provide an update and confirm it can be closed.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough:
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5
  • https://www.loom.com/share/b1f338d04eb44b118d915b107a6ed087?sid=1dbc4938-b676-4cd2-a748-5692874039dc

@joel If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5
  • https://www.loom.com/share/b1f338d04eb44b118d915b107a6ed087?sid=1dbc4938-b676-4cd2-a748-5692874039dc
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Joel

To make the updates easier, can we just replicate Acouflor Sustainability page to Acoufelt?

Let me know next steps

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Thanks Joel!

Sustainability insights is displaying properly now but I still couldn't copy and paste the one that I mentioned in my previous email.

Also, how can I link the entire column/container and not just the button/icon? I noticed that in the Acoufelt site there is no 'Link anything' option

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Sure, we have cleared/purged the cache for you.
https://acoufelt.com.au/sustainability/

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
